name: rnblopn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)))), wcel(c2, c3))

stmt.origin: sselda(c2, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), c3, wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
stmt.pretty: sselda(c2, ran((ball ` c0)), c3, c0 ∈(*Met ` c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)))), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ ran((ball ` c0)))→ c2 ∈ c3)
⊣ (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)→ ran((ball ` c0))⊆ c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)))), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ ran((ball ` c0)))→ c2 ∈ c3)
⊣ (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)→ ran((ball ` c0))⊆ c3)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), c3))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)→ ran((ball ` c0))⊆ c3)
⊣ c3 =(MetOpen ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)))), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ ran((ball ` c0)))→ c2 ∈ c3)
⊣ c3 =(MetOpen ` c0)

comment: A ball of a metric space is an open set. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2006.)
